ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What s going on? Dark One! (Hiss yelled, all heads turning to him) The other employeer replied to our transmission.  He says three of us will be fine.

Dark One/Breakdown/Hiss/Pryo:

::Dark One stepped out of one of the CR chambers in the Alliance base, his 
optics adjusting to the sudden light change instantly::
::Looking around, he saw Breakdown and Pyro huddled around Hiss::
"What's going on?"

"Dark One!" (Hiss yelled, all heads turning to him)
"The other employeer replied to our transmission.  He says three of us will 
be fine.  The unit, he identified as Quickstrike, is at coordinates 6.99-4.  
I know where that is as well.  All three of us have taken the time to study 
up on current and past events in the Alliance base's mainframe."

"As have I, Hiss.  Proceed now." (Dark One ordered)
"Scavenger and I will remain behind.  When you get the blank protoform, be 
sure to bring it back.  If anyone tries to steal it, Breakdown, you have my 
permission to destroy it."

"As you command." The three other Oblitercons said in unison.
Breakdown transformed to his termite mode, Pyro to his black dragon, and Hiss 
to his rattlesnake mode, and they headed for the coordinates.

::Dark One activated a short range comlink to Zardus::
<Zardus, three of my members are exiting the base, the rest of us will stay 
here and guard the base until further orders are provided.  Until then, I 
wish to see the energon you plan on paying us with>
